pr_title: Allow delayed subscription to channel handled by emitters

timeline.message: allow delayed subscription to channel handled by emitters

timeline.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText: How about "No subscriber found for the channel "?
replies.author: Emily-Jiang

replies.bodyText: Much better, let me change this!
replies.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText:
Warning or just a trace?
How important is it for developers/debugging to know nothing is subscribed on creation?
timeline.author: kenfinnigan

replies.bodyText: It can be important. In the previous version, it was failing the deployment, that's why I went for warning.
replies.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText: I see what you meant. This will impact spec and tck change because the validation is at runtime instead of startup time.
timeline.author: Emily-Jiang

replies.bodyText: Yes, That's what I meant. This is actually required for eclipse/microprofile-reactive-messaging#3 where the subscription is handler by the user.
replies.author: cescoffier
